# ::snt Great! United against terrorism.

comment: Read Raul Castros Memo to Cubas first Military Mission to Algeria, Oct. , . Doc.
amr:
# ::snt Read Raul Castros Memo to Cubas first Military Mission to Algeria, Oct. , . Doc.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (r / read-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Raul"
                        :op2 "Castros"
                        :op3 "Memo"))
            :ARG1 (m2 / mission-01
                  :ARG0 (c / country
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Cuba"))
                  :ARG1 (m3 / military)
                  :ord (o / ordinal-entity
                        :value 1)
                  :destination (c2 / country
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Algeria")))
            :time (d / date-entity
                  :month 10))
      :snt2 (p2 / person
            :name (n4 / name
                  :op1 "Doc")))
